DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to identify factors influencing work engagement and wellbeing in German-speaking intensive-care providers and anesthesiologists.
DOC.brief_title: Resilience and Mentoring in German-speaking Intensive Care Providers and Anesthesiologists
DOC.criteria: resident or staff anesthetist since more than 6 months working for the same institution no informedconsent
